comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Duchess_Maria_Pavlovna_of_Rus... Uses same picture. In 1908 she married Prince Vilhelm, Duke of Södermanland (17 June 1884 - 5 June 1965), the second son of King Gustav V of Sweden. On May 11, 1913, according to the NYT, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9801E0D7173FE633A... they were rumored to have been selected to rule Albania. "It is rumored that Prince William, second son of the King of Sweden, and his wife, Princess Marie, have been selected by the powers of the Triple Entente as the rulers of the new Kingdom of Albania, which is to be formed on the conclusion of peace between Turkey and the Allies." But by November 1913 the marriage was over and she was back in Russia.
